first_translate: don’t let the darkness touch you!
second_translate: You must never touch the darkness!
label: you mustn't come in contact with the darkness!

first_translate: please follow the knights and evacuate.
second_translate: Please follow the knight and evacuate.
label: you must follow the guards from here and evacuate.

first_translate: knights, make sure to protect the saint!
second_translate: Knights, ensure the saint's safe escort!
label: men, make sure to protect her holiness at all costs!

first_translate: then I’ll be on my way--
label: take care, then...

hangle: 영애, 어둠이 다가오는 쪽으로 돌아갈 생각이신가요?
first_translate: my lady, are you going back toward the darkness?
second_translate: My lady, are you thinking of going back toward the darkness?
label: lady fiona, are you thinking of going toward the darkness?

hangle: 본부에 아직 남아 있는 사람이 있을지도 모르니까요.
first_translate: there may still be people left at the base.
second_translate: There may still be people left at the headquarters.
label: there may be some people left at the base.

first_translate: I’ll be back soon, so don’t worry--
second_translate: I’ll be back soon, so don’t worry.
label: I'll be right back, so don't worry...

first_translate: something is trying to kill you!
second_translate: Something is trying to kill you, my lady!
label: something is trying to kill you, lady fiona!

first_translate: my partner is trapped inside the base!
second_translate: A comrade is trapped inside the headquarters!
label: my colleague is stuck inside the base!

first_translate: thank you for saving me, magician!
second_translate: I owe you my life, magician!
label: thank you so much for saving my life, my lady!

hangle: 어둠과 마수가 몰려와서 꼼짝없이 죽는 줄로만 알았어요!
first_translate: I thought I was going to die when the darkness and demons came!
second_translate: I thought I was doomed when the darkness and monsters swarmed in!
label: I thought I was going to die with all those beasts rushing toward me with the darkness!

second_translate: If you're going to thank someone, thank Gunter!
label: you can thank gunter for that!

first_translate: he followed me to this dangerous place.
second_translate: He even came along to this dangerous place.
label: he's the one that came along and did all the work.

hangle: 그보다, 정말 이제 남은 사람은 없는 거죠?
first_translate: by the way, are you sure there’s no one left?
second_translate: More importantly, are you sure there's no one left?
label: more importantly, is there no one left?
yes! I was the last one!

first_translate: now we just have to go back--
second_translate: Now we just have to go back…
label: now we just need to get back...

first_translate: I’m going to use a large-scale spell!
second_translate: I'm going to use a large-scale spell!
label: I'm going to use some powerful magic!

second_translate: It’s dangerous, so hurry and go!
label: it's dangerous here, so we should get moving!

second_translate: It got this close so quickly?
label: how could it be this fast?

first_translate: I’ve never seen darkness like this before…
second_translate: I've never seen darkness like this before...
label: I've never seen the darkness like this before...

first_translate: it feels like a boulder is crushing my heart.
second_translate: It feels like a boulder is crushing my heart.
label: it feels like my heart is being crushed by a boulder.

second_translate: I feel like I'm losing consciousness…
label: I think I'm about to black out...

first_translate: is this the “something” eunice was talking about?
second_translate: Is this the "something" Eunice was talking about?
label: is this the “something” that eunice was talking about?

first_translate: your highness, it’s dangerous. please wait inside.
second_translate: Your Highness, it is dangerous. Please wait inside.
label: your highness, it's dangerous there. please wait for her over here.
what, your highness? where are you...?
